DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate effect experimental oral nutritional supplement contain AN777 compare another oral nutritional supplement malnourish , elderly population .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Oral Nutritional Supplement Containing AN777
DOC.criteria: Subject ( male female ) > equal 65 < equal 90 year age Subject ambulatory Subject Subjective Global Assessment B C Subject gait speed < 0.8 m/s AND/OR low handgrip strength Subject Class 1 Class 2 sarcopenia Subject agree refrain start resistance exercise program Subject type 1 type 2 diabetes Subject inflammatory disease elevate high sensitivity Creactive protein Subject renal function impairment Subject report gastrointestinal disorder ( severe chronic diarrhea , nausea , vomit ) would preclude ingestion study product ; obstruction gastrointestinal tract , inflammatory bowel disease ; short bowel syndrome major gastrointestinal disease Subject report current active malignant disease significant medical diagnosis . Subject report history allergy ingredient study product Subject report currently take medications/dietary supplements/substances could profoundly modulate metabolism weight .
